name: The Way Home (itch) (AviaEyal, Mika Holtzman)
description:
The Way Home is a two players co-op puzzle platformer, where the players stuck in a fantastical universe and try to find their way out and back home.

To reach their goal they would have to work together and solve puzzles in order to unlock the next level, all that while exploring some magical places.

  CONTROLS

CREDITS

Mika Holtzman, Avia Eyal, Nitzan Knoll, Sapir Sdeor.

Special thanks to Eran Hilleli, Doron Assayas Terre, Gideon Rimmer

This game was made as part of a 'Digital Game' course in Bezalel Academy, 2023.
